#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, and x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 155000 174000 158000 177000 157000 175000 155000 174000 155000 174000
x 266000 284000 269000 286500 267000 285500 266000 284000 266000 284000
x 375000 394000 384500 396500 378000 394000 375000 394000 375000 394000
x 485500 504000 490000 505000 490000 504000 485500 504000 485500 504000
x 597000 613000 599000 615000 597000 613500 597000 613000 597000 613000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
